German resident: T2 - German VAT chargeable at 19%, if artist is registered for German VAT
EU Resident (not Germany): T3 - Charge subject to reverse charge for VAT, if artist is registered for VAT elsewhere in EU
ROW Resident: T0 - no VAT charge/outside scope, unless artist is registered for German VAT (T2)

German resident: T3 - Charge subject to reverse charge for VAT, if artist is registered for VAT in Germany
EU Resident (not Germany):
T3 - Charge subject to reverse charge for VAT, if artist is registered for VAT elsewhere in EU.
*If artist is registered in the same country as the promoter, local VAT may be applicable.
ROW Resident:
T0 - Outside scope of German VAT, 0%, unless artist is registered for VAT elsewhere in EU (T3).
*If artist is registered for VAT in the same country as the promoter, local VAT may be applicable.

German resident: T0 - no VAT charge / outside scope of German VAT, 0%
EU Resident (not Germany): T0 - no VAT charge / Outside scope of German VAT, 0%
ROW Resident: T0 - no VAT charge / Outside scope of German VAT, 0%
